remarks.para: Except for ER operations, one per engine may be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: Ignition selector remains in BOTH position, and
Engine anti-ice systems are operative on associated engine(s).
Maintain Ignition Selector in the BOTH position.

placard.para: Placard Ignition Selector on overhead panel "_______ INOP - MAINTAIN IN BOTH" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
